responsibilities: Proactively greeted customers and assisted with product selection, resulting in consistent achievement of daily sales targets.
Processed transactions accurately using POS systems and managed returns and exchanges according to company policy.
Maintained store visual standards by replenishing stock and organizing displays on the sales floor.
Supported the guest services team by addressing customer inquiries and resolving minor complaints efficiently.
Assisted with inventory management, including receiving shipments and scanning merchandise into the tracking system.
Shadowed senior sales leads to learn effective upselling techniques and product demonstration skills.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
